column.name: is_master
column.description: This parameter is used only in the context of large system where maps are imported from Navteq or OSM.

column.name: source
column.description: Network, from which current network was derived.

column.name: in_use
column.description: If false, the network cannot be used - same as depricated.

column.name: locked
column.description: If true, the network is read-only.

column.name: geom
column.description: Geo location: SRID 4326

column.name: in_synch
column.description: This flag indicates whether the node type and position are in sync with the other nodes in the family.

column.name: geom
column.description: Geometry: SRID 4326

column.name: length
column.description: Length in meters.

column.name: detail_level
column.description: From 1 (important) to 5 (less so) used for subselection.

column.name: in_synch
column.description: This flag indicates whether the link configuration is synchronized with the rest of the links in the family.

column.name: lanes
column.description: Number of lanes.

column.name: display_lane_offset
column.description: This parameter indicates how link should be displayed at the map.

column.name: speed_limit
column.description: In meters per second.

column.name: weight
column.description: This value is 1 for usual vehicles, and typically 3 for trucks.

column.name: standard
column.description: Flag indicating whether this is a standard type (if true) or user-defined.

column.name: destination_link_id
column.description: If the destination is not specified, the demand is added to the background flow.

column.name: factor
column.description: Should be greater than 1 for downstream merge weaving, or less than -1 for upstream diverge weaving. 1 and -1 represent no weaving.

column.name: destination_link_id
column.description: If the destination is not specified, the demand is added to the background flow.

column.name: dt
column.description: Sampling rate in seconds. Default is 300 (5 minutes).

column.name: start_time
column.description: Start time in seconds. Default is 0.

column.name: ordinal
column.description: Order of the split ratio

column.name: split_ratio
column.description: Value between 0 and 1.

column.name: dt
column.description: Sampling rate in seconds. Default is 300 (5 minutes).

column.name: start_time
column.description: Start time in seconds. Default is 0.

column.name: number
column.description: Order of the fundamental diagram

column.name: free_flow_speed
column.description: Free flow speed in m/s.

column.name: critical_speed
column.description: Critical speed in m/s.

column.name: congestion_wave_speed
column.description: Congestion wave speed in m/s.

column.name: capacity
column.description: Maximum flow per lane in vehicles per second per lane (vphl).

column.name: jam_density
column.description: Maximum density per lane in vehicles per meter per lane (vphl). Optional - used for trapezoidal fundamental diagrams.

column.name: capacity_drop
column.description: Capacity drop in vphl. Optional.

column.name: capacity_std
column.description: Expression of uncertainty in capacity in vehicles per second per lane. Optional.

column.name: free_flow_speed_std
column.description: Expression of uncertainty in free flow speed in m/s. Optional.

column.name: congestion_wave_speed_std
column.description: Expression of uncertainty in congestion wave speed in m/s. Optional.

column.name: destination_link_id
column.description: If the destination is not specified, the demand is added to the background flow.

column.name: dt
column.description: Sampling rate in seconds. Default is 300 (5 minutes).

column.name: start_time
column.description: Start time in seconds. Default is 0.

column.name: knob
column.description: Coefficient by which the demand is multiplied before being fed to the simulation. Default value is 1.

column.name: std_deviation_additive
column.description: Demand uncertainty in vph. Default value is 0.

column.name: std_deviation_multiplicative
column.description: Demand uncertainty. Default value is 1.

column.name: number
column.description: Order of the demand

column.name: demand
column.description: Demand flow in vph.

column.name: dt
column.description: Sampling rate in seconds. Default is 300 (5 minutes).

column.name: start_time
column.description: Start time in seconds. Default is 0.

column.name: number
column.description: Order of the downstream boundary capacity

column.name: downstream_boundary_capacity
column.description: Maximum flow that can exit this link in vph.

column.name: original_id
column.description: How this sensor is identified in the field. In reality, this can be a group of sensors - VDS.

column.name: data_source_id
column.description: Which data feed does this sensor belong to.

column.name: display_geometry
column.description: SRID 4326

column.name: link_id
column.description: If link ID is not present, the sensor is not assigned.

column.name: link_position
column.description: Offset in meters from the begining of the link.

column.name: lane_number
column.description: Optional parameter indicating at which lane the sensor is located.

column.name: health_status
column.description: Value in the range of [0, 1], indicating how healthy the detector is: 0 = dead/ totally unreliable, 1 = 100% trustworthy.

column.name: nema
column.description: Phase number: 1-16. Currently used are 1-8.

column.name: min_green_time
column.description: Minimum green time in seconds.

column.name: yellow_time
column.description: Yellow time in seconds.

column.name: red_clear_time
column.description: Time required to clear the intersection after the signal turned red, in seconds.

column.name: nema
column.description: Phase number: 1-16. Currently used are 1-8.

column.name: java_class
column.description: Column for user-defined queue controllers.

column.name: java_class
column.description: Column for user-defined controllers.

column.name: dt
column.description: Invocation period in seconds. Default is 30.

column.name: display_geometry
column.description: SRID 4326

column.name: start_time
column.description: Start time in seconds. Default is 0.

column.name: duration
column.description: Active time in seconds. Default is 86400 (24 hours).

column.name: source
column.description: Data source: model, PeMS, probes, etc.

column.name: mean
column.description: Noise mean in m/s.

column.name: stdev
column.description: Noise standard deviation in m/s.

column.name: java_class
column.description: Column for user-defined controllers.

column.name: display_geometry
column.description: SRID 4326

column.name: enabled
column.description: If the event is not enabled, it does not fire.

column.name: split_ratio
column.description: Value between 0 and 1.

column.name: scenario_element_id
column.description: Reference to the scenario element with parameters.

column.name: scenario_element_type
column.description: Determines where to look for the referenced scenario element: link|node|signal|sensor|controller|queue controller|event.

column.name: parent_element_id
column.description: ID of the controller or the event that works with referenced scenario elements.

column.name: parent_element_type
column.description: Determines where to look for the referenced scenario element: controller|event.

column.name: name
column.description: Table name

column.name: is_key
column.description: Indicates if this column is a part of the key for finding table elements.

column.name: parent_element_id
column.description: ID of the controller or the event that works with referenced scenario elements.

column.name: parent_element_type
column.description: Determines where to look for the referenced scenario element: controller|event.

column.name: type
column.description: feedback or target

column.name: scenario_element_id
column.description: Reference to the scenario element.

column.name: scenario_element_type
column.description: Determines where to look for the referenced scenario element: link|node|signal|sensor|controller|queue controller|event.

column.name: simulation_start_time
column.description: Start time in seconds. Default is 0.

column.name: simulation_duration
column.description: Active time in seconds. Default is 86400 (24 hours).

column.name: simulation_dt
column.description: Simulation step in seconds. Default is 1.

column.name: output_dt
column.description: Frequency of writing the output in seconds. Default is 60.

column.name: status
column.description: Status of the run execution.

column.name: simulation_start_time
column.description: Start time in seconds. Default is 0.

column.name: simulation_duration
column.description: Active time in seconds. Default is 86400 (24 hours).

column.name: simulation_dt
column.description: Simulation step in seconds. Default is 1.

column.name: output_dt
column.description: Frequency of writing the output in seconds. Default is 60.

column.name: aggregation
column.description: Aggregation level: raw|1min|5min|15min|1hour|1day|total.

column.name: type
column.description: Type of data: standard (mean)|std|1Q|3Q|best case|worst case|max|min.

column.name: cell_number
column.description: Sometimes, a link can be divided into several cells. Usually, there is just a single cell.

column.name: free_flow_speed
column.description: Free flow speed in m/s.

column.name: critical_speed
column.description: Critical speed in m/s.

column.name: congestion_wave_speed
column.description: Congestion wave speed in m/s.

column.name: capacity
column.description: Maximum flow per lane in vehicles per second per lane (vphl).

column.name: jam_density
column.description: Maximum density per lane in vehicles per meter per lane (vphl). Optional - used for trapezoidal fundamental diagrams.

column.name: capacity_drop
column.description: Capacity drop in vphl. Optional.

column.name: aggregation
column.description: Aggregation level: raw|1min|5min|15min|1hour|1day|total.

column.name: type
column.description: Type of data: standard (mean)|std|1Q|3Q|best case|worst case|max|min.

column.name: cell_number
column.description: Sometimes, a link can be divided into several cells. Usually, there is just a single cell.

column.name: aggregation
column.description: Aggregation level: raw|1min|5min|15min|1hour|1day|total.

column.name: type
column.description: Type of data: standard (mean)|std|1Q|3Q|best case|worst case|max|min.

column.name: cell_number
column.description: Sometimes, a link can be divided into several cells. Usually, there is just a single cell.

column.name: los
column.description: LOS - Level Of Service as defined in Highway Capacity Manual.

column.name: vc_ratio
column.description: Volume to capacity ratio.

column.name: aggregation
column.description: Aggregation level: raw|1min|5min|15min|1hour|1day|total.

column.name: type
column.description: Type of data: standard (mean)|std|1Q|3Q|best case|worst case|max|min.

column.name: cell_number
column.description: Sometimes, a link can be divided into several cells. Usually, there is just a single cell.

column.name: aggregation
column.description: Aggregation level: raw|1min|5min|15min|1hour|1day|total.

column.name: type
column.description: Type of data: standard (mean)|std|1Q|3Q|best case|worst case|max|min.

column.name: phase
column.description: Phase number: 1-16. Currently used are 1-8.

column.name: aggregation
column.description: Aggregation level: raw|1min|5min|15min|1hour|1day|total.

column.name: type
column.description: Type of data: standard (mean)|std|1Q|3Q|best case|worst case|max|min.

column.name: begin_green
column.description: Begin of the green period for the given phase. Optional - makes sense only for raw data.

column.name: duration
column.description: Duration of green for this phase in seconds.

column.name: phase
column.description: Phase number: 1-16. Currently used are 1-8.

column.name: aggregation
column.description: Aggregation level: raw|1min|5min|15min|1hour|1day|total.

column.name: type
column.description: Type of data: standard (mean)|std|1Q|3Q|best case|worst case|max|min.

column.name: phase_utilization
column.description: Percentage of green used.

column.name: progression_quality
column.description: Percentage of vehicles arriving during green phase.

column.name: delay_per_cycle
column.description: Delay per cycle for given phase.

column.name: queue_size
column.description: Size of the queue waiting for green phase.

column.name: number_of_stops
column.description: Number of cycles needed to pass through intersection.
